TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_akaway, title = akaway, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/akaway} }

S.FORM: akaway (kamu nu Hulam: 莖 ) u akaway atu lamit ku tusaay a siiyuay i kilang atu lutuk. i pabaw nu akaway ku papah, i sasa nu akaway ku lamit. namahiza naayaw u akaway adada' aca i kilang atu lutuk. masumad tu ku sakasipapah atu sakasilamit.

akaway (kamo no Holam: 莖 ) o akaway ato lamit ko tosaay a siiyoay i kilang ato lotok. i pabaw no akaway ko papah, i sasa no akaway ko lamit. namahiza naayaw o akaway adada' aca i kilang ato lotok. masomad to ko sakasipapah ato sakasilamit.
